name: Vimium C
keyMappings: unmap b                     # unmap default bookmark shortcuts to repurpose 'b'
map bd removeTab            # b d -> Close current tab:contentReference[oaicite:23]{index="23}"
map bo closeOtherTabs       # b o -> Close other tabs (keep current; pinned tabs are preserved):contentReference[oaicite:24]{index="24}:contentReference[oaicite:25]{index=25}"
map bP closeOtherTabs       # b P -> Close all non-pinned tabs (same as above, leaves pinned tabs):contentReference[oaicite:26]{index="26}:contentReference[oaicite:27]{index=27}"
map bp togglePinTab         # b p -> Pin current tab:contentReference[oaicite:28]{index="28}"
map bu togglePinTab         # b u -> Unpin current tab:contentReference[oaicite:29]{index="29}"
map bb visitPreviousTab     # b b -> Switch to last active tab (previously visited tab):contentReference[oaicite:30]{index="30}:contentReference[oaicite:31]{index=31}"
map bh moveTabLeft          # b h -> Move tab left (reorder tab):contentReference[oaicite:32]{index="32}:contentReference[oaicite:33]{index=33}"
map bl moveTabRight         # b l -> Move tab right (reorder tab):contentReference[oaicite:34]{index="34}:contentReference[oaicite:35]{index=35}"
